messages.message:
Hey everyone, if you're seeing an infinite spinner in the space selector of explorer in any of your environments, can you try doing the following (thanks to @John St for finding this solution!):

1. Open up your chrome dev tools in the environment it's not working
2. Go to the Application tab
3. Expand "Cookies" in the lefthand menu and click the url below
4. There should be three cookies where the name is "session," with three different domains - dogfood, uat.dogfood, and instabase.com (http://instabase.com). Delete all three of these cookies
5. You'll have to log back into all of your environments
This worked for me, please let me know if (or if not) it works for you!
It looks like you can also open up an incognito window and use that if you need a solution that will work immediately
